h2_title: Yellow Wind Sage Boss Fight and Guide
content: However, attacking from the front can often prove dangerous, as you don’t want to drain all your stamina and run out of juice for dodging. He can often lure you in, and then stab his imbued weapon down right in front of him. Don’t dodge backward but instead flee to the sides, as the impact will create a line of smaller spears from the sand itself that erupt in a straight line from the point of impact.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow_Wind_Sage.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow Wind Sage', specifically from the subsection 'Yellow Wind Sage Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
However, attacking from the front can often prove dangerous, as you don’t want to drain all your stamina and run out of juice for dodging. He can often lure you in, and then stab his imbued weapon down right in front of him. Don’t dodge backward but instead flee to the sides, as the impact will create a line of smaller spears from the sand itself that erupt in a straight line from the point of impact.
